N = int(input())
A = [0] + list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = list(range(N + 1))
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    ans[A[i]] += 1

for i in range(1, N + 1):
    print(ans[i])

N = int(input())
A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

B = [0] * N
for i in range(1, N):
    B[A[i - 1]] += 1

for i in range(N):
    print(B[i])

for i in range(1, N + 1):
    print(ans[i])

N = int(input())
A = [0] + list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = [0] * (N + 1)
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    ans[A[i]] += 1

for i in range(1, N + 1):
    print(ans[i])
